website_summaries.verdict: Aesthetically super cool, you'll turn heads with this case while keeping your healthy Nintendo Switch game collection safe and secure.
pros: The latch is easy to open and close, and the thickness gives the case an extremely secure look and feel
The outside design is well made, and is something any gamer can appreciate
cons: Some may find the case somewhat heavy and sometimes the games may become loose in their slots

customer_reviews.title: Geekn' on the Go!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pocketbook design and the mystery block is a head-turner whenever spotted. Pros: 12 Cartridge slots in a wallet sized case . Build and materials are high quality, easy to clean, each slot has and individual slot for a Micro SD card as well. Cons: (more like personal opinions) The latch swings loosely when the case isn't shut, it's not a big deal but I'd prefer a stiffer latch. Although the rubberized interior is great and everything is snug, this case is NOT waterproof! So don't get too comfy. Form and Function is what makes this a great product. I'd give it 5 if it created a seal when shut and the latch was a bit more secure.
customer_reviews.author: JuiceBoxKev

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game case
customer_reviews.text: These are really well built inside and out. The case is very thick plastic but the block part on the front is actually three dimensional and made from some sort of dense rubber. Game cards stay in place but are easy to pull out.
customer_reviews.author: FanBoiii

customer_reviews.title: well-made and works great for PS Vita game carts!
customer_reviews.text: I impulsively bought this after my husband gave me a Switch for Christmas. For the price, I was pleasantly surprised at the high quality of the plastic enclosure and the foam rubber inserts. As an added bonus, my PS Vita games fit perfectly, too!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Simple hard shell with soft, strong foam interior
customer_reviews.text: This looks great for a Zelda fan, plus it’s well designed. The shell is hard, has a robust closure, and the foam interior is firm, but soft enough to protect the cartridges. Can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas & Jessii

customer_reviews.title: Work great, look great
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of these cartridge cases. I've bought them in a couple of colors. They hold my Ninendo games very securely. I wish they came in bigger editions, though, as I'd like to have all my games in one case. Couldn't be happier with the looks and sturdiness of these, though! Let Amazon donate to your favorite charity! Use Amazon Smile (smile.amazon.com) when you order and Amazon will donate to the charity of your choice when you make a qualifying purchase. Check out how Amazon Smile works at  My shopping is donating to my favorite charity, Canines for Independence at no cost to me. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: 📚 Bookwyrm 📚Top Contributor: Brewing

customer_reviews.title: Cute case, does the job, but scuffs easily
customer_reviews.text: It is a cute case and cuts down on the space on game boxes, but it scuffs really easily. I put it in my switch carrying case overnight, took it out the next day to grab a game and there were these scuffs on the question mark that will not come off, no matter how I try to remove them. The photos don't show how bad they are but, the scuffs are far worse in person. It doesn't prevent the case from doing its job, but it's annoying to look at, so based on this it gets 4 stars for me.
customer_reviews.author: pcamille

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT case
customer_reviews.text: By far one of the best purchases I've made on here. definitely the best case you can buy. Hard outer case is great quality, opens/closes/locks exactly as it should. Real reason I originally bought this case was for the soft rubber cutouts to hold the game cards and I wasn't disappointed. They are soft enough to hold the games without damage, while firm and tacky enough to keep them inplace. I have zero worries about damage to the cards or the cards being secured inplace. My kids leave the case open all the time and after multiple falls off the book shelf there has yet to be a game card come loose.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made product
customer_reviews.text: This item is extremely heavy and well made product not cheap. The inside is soft rubber so its gentle on the games inserting and removing. Its not hard plastic on the inside with that terrible snap that sounds like you broke your cartridge like some cases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Store your games with the triforce
customer_reviews.text: I already own the blue crest one, and I liked it so much I ordered a second one, in this color. Premium quality materials, seamless lock, games are steady on the inside, kind of useless to have 12 memory card slots, it's not like people with a switch will have 12 of those. I guess it works if you want to store all of your memory cards. It's rough, tough, seems very durable and sturdy. It's an amazing deep black and has a beautiful contrast with the gold "Z". Beautiful and durable acquisition that will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: My third PowerA Nintendo Premium Game Case
customer_reviews.text: Much like the other two, this specialized themed game case is both cute in design, feels great to put a Switch game inside and take out, and small enough for easy carrying. Very satisfied with these cases so far!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M. Ydstie

customer_reviews.title: Price almost tripled in past 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product and I looked to purchase another one. Then I realized since I last purchased the price has sky rocketed. Idk understand how a few months back they were $10 dollars and now they are $27-28. For $10 dollar this is a five star product but for almost $30 this is way over priced and there are way more products for better prices available.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: 12 games is a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I just recently purchased a Nintendo Switch. I just bought my son a Sonic game for the Switch, which means I had to get a game case. I wanted to keep the Zelda theme going, so I asked my son which case he wanted. He liked to blue one, I bought it. The game case makes a gate addition to my Zelda themed carrier. 12 games is plenty of games for me
customer_reviews.author: KingCrossRd2010

customer_reviews.title: Best game holder for switch games!
customer_reviews.text: Best game holder, hands down! I bought another one but ended up giving it to a sweet friend and therefore I’ll be buying another one! It’s awesome because you can put a memory card under each game holder if you wanted to. It holds a nice and snug and fits in the back of your pocket! Perfect game holder for the switch!!!
customer_reviews.author: SassyAmazoner!

customer_reviews.title: Game Card Case...but Premium?
customer_reviews.text: I used this to put games I play back frequently or is currently switching around in playing. The game cartridges doesn't fall when I shake it. Not as good for traveling as it is slightly bulky compare to another one I purchased just for traveling. One downside I'd notice is that it does collect lint quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: Looks great at first glance but the front of it is glued together right the front zelda symbol came right of on the first day had to glue it back together never really went bacl together cleanly
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Cool case easy to haul around
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We have a question block too. These are cool and fun, especially if you want a mario theme going on. Lol. The minor problem was I accidentally was sent a case pack of 4. I notified Amazon to make sure whether this was right or not, it was not. The minor inconvenience of sending the other 3 back through UPS is a problem but I'm glad it's all an easy process.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Whitby

customer_reviews.title: If you only have a few Switch cartridges, this is the right case to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great little case! The space for 12 SD cards is unnecessary but it’s in a tiny spot behind each game slot, so it’s not wasted space. Holds game cartridges solidly and snaps shut securely. All hinges are actual HINGES, not folded plastic that falls apart over time. Doesn’t hold a ton of carts, but that’s pretty plain in the description.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: It’s like the block escaped the game!
customer_reviews.text: The color is true-to-picture, and the case itself is a hard plastic (which is good, since I have a bad habit of dropping things). The case holds 12 cartridges, which is a healthy number since most people tend to use the eShop to download games nowadays. Overall, I’d say this is a good investment for those who love Mario and have a good amount of cartridges laying around.
customer_reviews.author: mashers90

customer_reviews.title: Great game card case
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the Mario theme, and the case is much easier to get games in and out it without touching the metal part of them and possibly causing damage. Case is easy to open and close, but securely closes. Fits in travel bag with Switch. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well and looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: I've had this as long as I've had my switch now (so over a year), and it has held up well to travel and looks nice enough to have sitting next to my switch on my entertainment center. I will likely buy another one of the designs as soon as I run out of hard-copy game space in this one.
customer_reviews.author: RJM

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn’t have much expectations, I thought it might be flimsy and cheap but I liked it and the price was fair so I took the chance and I’m really glad I did. It’s high quality, feels sturdy, the latch feels nice and you can hear it snap in place ensuring you games are safe! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Small but tough
customer_reviews.text: It looks cheap from the outside but it is heavily padded and perfectly cut to hold your Switch game cartridges. Keep in mind, this is ONLY for game catridges. But that is what I wanted; something that will hold my games and fit in my bag. Slim, easy, and durable. Definitely RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: FK

customer_reviews.title: High quality, good looking, and very secure (good qualities in both a game case and life partner)
customer_reviews.text: Very handsome and high quality. Holds my games securely while still making it easy to both insert and remove them. The latch to the case also opens easily and holds securely without jostling the cartridges at all. The games also feel nicely cushioned in the case. It's maybe slightly larger than I expected but that's a minor quibble.
customer_reviews.author: Dipant

customer_reviews.title: pretty nice little case
customer_reviews.text: pretty nice little case. my son loves mario and knew exactly what the question mark was when he saw me open this up. bought to hold games for when we go on vacation and bring the nintendo switch but i'll prob just keep the games in here also at home.
customer_reviews.author: stevo

customer_reviews.title: Small and beautiful case!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this case it looks much smaller in person than in foto. The quality its at its best, definitely recommend for anyone with a library of switch games to take on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality case. The plastic shell feels really durable and has a great weight to it. The clasp feels great and makes a nice snap sound, but it does feel a bit flimsy. The cartridges are actually held in place by little rubber prongs, they don’t really snap in place. Haven’t had any problems with them coming out, I’ve even tried shaking it while open to see if they will pop out. They stay in great.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Woodall

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and keeps games well protected
customer_reviews.text: When you have two young boys, you better buy something to protect all those fragile $60 games. This works great and can take a beating. That and the game cards go in and out without ruining the little gold electronic things on the cartridge. Worth every cent...AND it's Zelda!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little case!
customer_reviews.text: Great, durable little case. Games are so expensive I couldn't trust my 7 year olds not to lose them so a case was the solution. This thing is almost too small! We've misplaced the whole case a few times but at least it's easier to find than a tiny Switch game! And the Mario theme was perfect for them!
customer_reviews.author: Keturah Erdley

customer_reviews.title: Legendary Symbol on a sweet case
customer_reviews.text: A great case for the few games I own. I purchase most in the Nintendo e-store, but some I like to buy hard copies for. Games fit very comfortably and don’t fall out. Small case is good for carrying on the go. Could probably fit Vita games and SD cards there too.
customer_reviews.author: Papadoc

customer_reviews.title: A nice house for your switch games
customer_reviews.text: It looks much better in person than what you see online. the inside is made of soft rubber, so you don't have to worry about your switch game being squished or scratch. The case fits up to 12 game carts/micro SD card. i recommend this a lot, especially if you like to have your switch games in a physical version.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Portable Switch Game Case
customer_reviews.text: This is a delightful case for your Switch games. It can store up to 12 game cartridges in a compact Mario question mark block design. There is one potential flaw to this and it's the latch that opens and closes the case. It feels like it could break any second. If you treat this well you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin bannisterTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have three other PowerA premium game cases. Clearly the dark blue Zelda one isn’t made the same. The latch to keep the case closed is different. More flimsy. Even the packaging it came in looked different. And also the label on the back wasn’t there. I paid double the amount looking specifically for the Power A Zelda game case. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Burns

customer_reviews.title: A bargain at $13
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent 4" X 3.5" X 3/4" case. It fits nicely in my men's pant or jean pockets. The games are held snug in place but are easy to remove. Easy 5/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Redge

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love it.. it was hard for me to choose between this one and the yellow question one. but at the end I wen for this one and is excellent. as soon as I fill this one with games ill get the yellow one.
customer_reviews.author: Hebert Leal

customer_reviews.title: Upside down logo on first one.
customer_reviews.text: Dont know what the odds are, but my first one had an upside down logo. Replaced and second one was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Soft on games
customer_reviews.text: Most game cases require the game to be forcefully clicked into hard plastic that always seems to be too small and could damage the games. Thus case forgoes the traditional hard plastic in favor of a softer silicone feel that the games fit into perfectly. Definitely recommend.7,
customer_reviews.author: spkdog

customer_reviews.title: Best Game Card Case for Switch!
customer_reviews.text: Best game card case I've used till today. it's soft inside so I'm not worried about the game cards getting scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Sumayyah

customer_reviews.title: Great case - easy in/out
customer_reviews.text: We had the Amazon Basics game card case and it was horrible compared to this. The foam case is great. Easy in, easy out. Only holds 12 compared to 24 in the Amazon Basics case but if we are so lucky to own 24 games then we will get another one of these ;)
customer_reviews.author: Nifty

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love all of the cases like this. Well built and holds the games in the case very well. Never have to worry about games falling out and the designs are all so great.
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like the case a lot. It’s exactly as described and the case itself and padding inside seem very sturdy and durable. I am slightly worried that the locking mechanism will eventually snap off or break. Be careful with use, otherwise the case itself is great. Update: I've had this over a year and no issue with the locking mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: dmelichar

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product have a Excellent quality have 12 slots for both games and SD Card of course no one have 12 sd card, but you never know. The material its very durable, and the games fit correctly without force the plastic because have a type of foam.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Solis

customer_reviews.title: This is the best case for your Switch games
customer_reviews.text: This is the best case for your Switch games. Yes, there are other cases that hold double the games, but the rubber interior keeps them secure without damaing. Games are too hard to get out of most Switch cases, not this one.
customer_reviews.author: J Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Great card case. The games fit snugly in the foam, but are easy to remove and fully visible. The clasp is secure but not difficult to open. It's also reasonably compact and fits easily in a small bag or backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Vargish

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage Unit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect storage case for the cartridges​ and opens and closes very easily. Also for the price point, the quality is outstanding and the slots are very easy to insert and remove for each of the games providing a safe while easy access product. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, Well Made Case
customer_reviews.text: This case feels super sturdy. The game cartridges fit in nice and snug, so I don't worry about them falling out. The clasp on the outside of the case doesn't feel flimsy at all. This is a well made case and I will be buying another one if I ever fill this up.
customer_reviews.author: jason mccollum

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is solid and it has 12 slots for games and memory cards. I don't think it needed 12 for memory cards but, hey, why not I guess? Other than that It looks and works great and I feel like my games are safe while they are in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Brier

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: If you are not looking to carry around the entire library of switch cartridges and 8 is enough, this unit is very well made. It was perfect for my needs and the hinge is pinned so it should last as long as the switch does.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Glessner

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for your switch game holder. The games fit perfect and this is durable and worth the money. So much easier to store games than haul all the cases around for a small chip the size of a sd card.
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: Best Case
customer_reviews.text: The outside is super fun and the inside is made of good material that holds a lot of games. Really great case that can sit out near the console and prevents having to use all the bulky game cases
customer_reviews.author: Amy R Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Durable and very nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: Holds the carts securely. I even dropped it hard on accident and the cards stayed put. The casing is very durable and I love the Zelda logo as it matches the rest of my Zelda Switch stickers. I can easily highly recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Mashuu

customer_reviews.title: Best Switch Game Case
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best case I have seen for switch game cards. I have tried others and this one holds games securely, cards are easily removed and it's sturdy. It may only hold 12, but for the peace of mind, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Se7en

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you need for a resonabile price. It's a nice snug fit but not to snug like others that damage the cartridges. You wont regret your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rios

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I got the question mark box; it's so cute and feels well made. I like that the inside is silicone, so I'm not worried about breaking my games.
customer_reviews.author: 1up

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It's easier if i have all of my games in one place, and this looks amazing. It has 12 spaces inside, it's really soft and comfortable. Recommended if you travel with your switch, or if you are not staying in just one place. I do keep all of my games in this game card case ^^.
customer_reviews.author: Shamir Camasta

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised by the quality of this case. The materials are a high quality you can feel it. It carries a lot of games for me and it's more than enough for traveling. I think will use it for all of the Mario games this way is more organized.
customer_reviews.author: WES

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the cartridge is lined with a soft, rubber material which will not damage the game cards. Removing the game cards from each slot is simple with absolutely no difficulty doing so. I was a little weary of buying other products as they seemed to hold the cards with hard plastic which I feared could damage the game cards or make it difficulty to remove them from each slot.
customer_reviews.author: Kohei

customer_reviews.title: Better, less expensive than Basics case
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I didn't see this before buying the Basics case, ended up getting this one and like it much better. While the Basics one can hold more games (24), I don't plan on owning that many physical titles. Plus the cartridges are much easier to insert and remove from this case. To top it all off, it's less expensive and looks sweet. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Duerr

customer_reviews.title: There are cheaper alternatives, but nothing like this one!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Super cool case design and holds my games with rubber rather than plastic. This means that the games are easier to take out without risking damage. Also fits 12 micro sd cards! I don't know why I would ever own 12 but it is nice to have. Overall love it, just wish it closed with magnets rather than with the clip.
customer_reviews.author: aBee150

customer_reviews.title: well designed
customer_reviews.text: unlike other card cases, the fit on this is perfect. (easy to put in/ take out) but there's no chance of card falling out. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Grizelda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Case
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding a Switch case because a lot of people on Amazon were talking about how some were snapping cases because they fit to snug. This is a great case and it's very thin. The inside is a nice feeling hard rubber. It's really cool and even looks like something you'd want to display.
customer_reviews.author: Scott803

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for Switch cartridges!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and convenient little case for your Switch cartridges! This small case holds 12 cartridges. And it keeps them safe and looks pretty rad in the case. Sparks conversations and compliments too!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Mares

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what you're looking for in a Switch cartridge case. Most of the other products are hard plastic on the inside, making it feel like you're going to break the game getting it in and out. This has soft(ish) rubber to hold the games. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Have two of these this ones snap was comeing loose other one works well
customer_reviews.author: dingess family buyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice small game card case.
customer_reviews.text: I like that small game card case. It's very useful and looks good. Also the quality is nice. It's always with me in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: Cute but carry case is easier
customer_reviews.text: My Minecraft fan loved this case! She ended up getting a carry case that holds switch and games plus charger but this was cute
customer_reviews.author: MustLoveDogs

customer_reviews.title: Efficient
customer_reviews.text: Mario Block???? LOVE IT!!!! Great game case way nicer then expected. I assumed it was going to be a cheap plastic case. I was wrong its very durable and the game slots are nice, this is a real..... dare i say....shwanky product. Lol amazing deal!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana G

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you need
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want a huge heavy case carrying around my games and other accessories. This was exactly what I needed. Fits 12 games, plenty, and is super portable with an amazing detail I love. Worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Yack

customer_reviews.title: Best One Out There
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a few options for holding my Switch game cartridges, and these are the best by far. Securely padded, good quality, holds a decent amount of games, and won’t damage the games.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great add on item or case
customer_reviews.text: I got this case as an add on item. It has plenty of storage and the place holders are made from a sturdy rubber. Each place holder can handle Nintendo Switch games plus Micro SDXC memory cards. Well built case. No worries. 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: JimTop Contributor: Bass Guitars & Gear

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Holds the games snuggly and latches firmly. Withstands my daughter tossing it around a bit and doesn’t fall open. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jpope623

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely impressed with the quality of this case. Very well made and the perfect compact size for travel.
customer_reviews.author: 3vergreener

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Needed storage for games. Plus side is hard case, foam inserts and has slots for memory cards as well. Fits comfortably in a man's back pocket or in a purse. The creeper design was a plus. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rican Lily

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Case
customer_reviews.text: I already owned one that had the Legend of Zelda Triforce Eagle on it so got this one as I needed more as I've got more than 12 game cartridges. It's a greaty quality game case that can hold 12 Switch games and 12 Micro SD cards at the same time. (If anything, this case is overkill in quality. My game seem very secure in this.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: So Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice case. It is fairly small, and so very portable. The rubber on the inside is high quality and will not damage my cartridges. I got the Zelda one and it is so cool.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, I love it
customer_reviews.text: Functions exactly as expected and looks and feels great. I can carry all of my Switch games with me at once, and in style.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: 5 star travel case
customer_reviews.text: Great travel case for your games. Very protective with the rubber interior, easy to put in and remove, and the design is great. Will be buying another with a different design when we get more games.
customer_reviews.author: DSL

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking and well built
customer_reviews.text: A sturdy well made case, I bought it intending to give it as a gift but I liked it and decided to keep it for myself. Will defiantly order more as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Mona Alemadi

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, stores games securely
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says, while looking like a nifty little mario powerblock. It's not bulky and easy to bring with you with your switch if you've got more than the 3 games the usual console case has room for.
customer_reviews.author: babyjeans

customer_reviews.title: great storage
customer_reviews.text: gently but securely stores all my physical games and i can store a micro sd card in each slot of the game card slots too.
customer_reviews.author: Fabrizio Milito

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this. Well made. feels very solid in the hand. Opens smoothly and the inside is a rubbery softish material. very nice. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Holland

customer_reviews.title: Super Mario Case!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second PowerA case for Switch games. I also own the [?] one in yellow. Holds games securely and snaps shut. The kids love the design!
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, it’s compact and works great! Fits in my switch case, keeps the game cartridges safe and organized. Easy to take games out and holds them safely in. Very well done in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Marie Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well constructed case for switch games. Will buy another.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool case for switch games. I was very indecisive when it came to buying something for storage but I'll without a doubt be buying another when this one is full which is now! I love how compact it is. The construction of the case really surprised me as well. From the type of hinge used to the way the foam padding grips the games just right to keep them secure. Must buy for any long time switch owner.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall swen

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this case
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice case, it holds the games nicely and you can tell it’s good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Did not recieve what I paid for. I ordered the black Zelda PowerA case and recieved this block case. Haven't opened it, but is definitely something I do not want.
customer_reviews.author: Smamazon Mustomer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Compact Game Case!
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly very high quality game case! Built with very sturdy materials. I guess if I had to mention something negative about it is the fact that they don't offer a bigger case to hold more games. However, the compact size is more than enough for me as I want to have a variety of accessories that take up minimal space. This case comes in a variety of colors/themes but by far the iconic question block is my favorite! Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: Holds cartridges nicely without having to use force to get them out. And such a beautiful case too.
customer_reviews.text: Best case so far, game cartridges fit in snuggly but are easy to remove, no need to use force but they wont fall if you open it while moving. Apart from that, the case itself is beautiful. I bought the Mario M and the Zelda in black. I love them and would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie U

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This made a perfect gift for my girlfriend who loves Minecraft and just got a new Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Monster Matt

customer_reviews.title: Easily remove game cards
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Not exactly a portable size but I really like how easy game cards go in and come out. No chance of breaking games or my nails 😉
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Its just the perfect case for nintendo switch games. I have two of them already.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Alejandra Vega

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: It holds 12 games and quality is good. I like that the padding keeps the cartridges safe!
customer_reviews.author: General Anders

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality Case
customer_reviews.text: The fittings for the games inside the case are great, but the plastic hinge and latch build will likely fail at some point. Extremely cool design, and my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Pawlik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product! Hope to see more!
customer_reviews.text: This case is great! I now have a couple different ones. They hold the games perfectly and don’t have to worry about them getting damaged. I really hope they make a Pokémon one next!
customer_reviews.author: cdhanimations

customer_reviews.title: Cute storage case
customer_reviews.text: I love the design on this case! Plus it allows me to organize my games in an easy way to switch the out on a whim.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I didn’t think the quality was going to be this great!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cute small travel-friendly case to store your game cards.
customer_reviews.author: Mordea

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Knockoff
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a cheap knockoff. I have the black model with the z on it and the clasp is much thicker and more sturdy. That one I’m sure is real and bought from GameStop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teensy pouch
customer_reviews.text: The product was lot smaller than I expected,even after reading the specs. It holds a few game cards and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Gorillamonk

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, keeps my games secure and protects them. I love anything Legend of Zelda and this item didn't disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Alex G.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Works great, fits in my son's switch case, sturdy but easy access for his little hands
customer_reviews.author: Erin P. Cooley

product_meta.title: PowerA Premium Game Card Case for Nintendo Switch - POW
product_meta.description: Style:POWDisguised as a nostalgic pow Block, the Premium game card case can store up to 12 Nintendo Switch game cards and 12 micro SD cards simultaneously. The compact case is extremely durable and easy to take on-the-go. Form-fitting rubber slots keep your game cards in place and a snap-closure keeps everything secure. Disclaimer: will not cause earthquake when thrown or bumped. (Games not included.)
feature_bullets: Stores 12 Nintendo Switch game cards and 12 micro SD cards (games not included)
Form fitting rubber slots secure game cards
